text: Hey, a question regarding Transactional Emails integrations, if I wish to send an email from my a python backend, should I send a http request to HubSpot smtp server or should I use the ubspot-api-client package?

Hey Delene. email_each is a workaround for the lack of full HubL support in emails and doesnâ€™t support everything you are trying to do here. Instead you should look at the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails|programmable email beta> which will allow you to use normal HubL in the email.
Is there a way to have a single custom e-mail template, but with the option of changing colors?
Do you mean changing themes or just changing a few colors?

<@U9KA594Q3> Thanks mate, I've definitely enabled the beta and know that the code works but it's all a tad strange; e.g.) if I drag 2 of the same module into the email body, or print, it works. Can't figure out what the deal is!
If you want to DM me a link to the email and module I can take a closer look
